featured.title: A Believer or a Disciple?
featured.description: Discover the difference between being a believer and a true disciple of Jesus. This teaching challenges surface-level Christianity and calls you to a deeper,  life-changing relationship rooted in obedience,  freedom,  and faith in Christ alone. This teaching challenges surface-level Christianity and calls you to a deeper, life-changing relationship rooted in obedience, freedom, and faith in Christ alone.
